rules_text:
For each color among permanents you control as you cast this spell, choose one –
• Target player creates a 3/3 colorless Homunculus creature token.
• Create a tapped colorless land token named Everywhere that is every basic land type.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Target player gains 7 life.
• Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
